tool.name: manualCuration

data.name: htmlout
data.label: ${tool.name}: The interactive annotation HTML of promising miRNA candidates

tool.help:
.. class:: donemark
**What it does**
This tool generates detailed summary and report pages for miRNA refinement during manual inspection.
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **Selected miRNAs from miRNASelection:** miRNA table from miRNASelection, which includes classification results based on high-throughput criteria and/or machine learning-based approaches;
- **Sample information:** Sample information as following examples:
| SRR11829907 inflorescence | SRR11347201 leaf | ......
- **Gene descriptions:** Gene descriptions as following examples:
| AT1G18630 GR-RBP6 | AT4G25980 Peroxidase 43 | AT5G04040 SDP1 | AT4G27920 RCAR4 | AT4G27980 Domain of unknown function (DUF3444) | AT3G14150 HAOX2 | AT5G45750 RABA1c | ......
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
The summary and report pages contain information of miRNA precursors and mature miRNAs, which could assist researchers to select promising candidate miRNAs.
|
